body: Planning          Management Documents: ♦ Superintendent's Compendium ♦ General Management Plan  ♦ General Management Plan (Final Presentation Plan) ♦ Public Law 87-547 Cultural Resources: ♦ Cultural Landscape Report Treatment Plan ♦ Cultural Landscape Report ♦ Historic Furnishings Report, Volume I ♦ Roosevelt Home Historic Structure Report ♦ New Barn Historic Structure Report ♦ Farm Buildings Historic Structures Report ♦ Gray Cottage Historic Structures Report   Historic Studies: ♦ Historic Resource Study ♦ Historic Resource Study (1972) ♦ Sagamore Hill NHS Administrative History  Natural Resources: ♦ Inventory of Odonata (Dragonflies and Damselflies) at Sagamore Hill NHS ♦ Salt Marsh Vegetation and Nekton Community Monitoring ♦ Vegetation Classification & Mapping ♦ Mammal Survey ♦ Avian Inventory of Sagamore Hill NHS ♦ Invasive Non-Native Plant Managment Plan ♦ Natural Resource Condition Assessment for Sagamore Hill National Historic Site     Documents Open for Public Review  Loading ...  There are currently no projects with documents open for public review for Sagamore Hill National Historic Site.    Other Plans and Projects An archive of completed projects as well as projects without documents open for comment may be found on the PEPC website.
title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Planning
